Control Name: 5.2 Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to remote server administration ports
Control Statement: It is recommended that no security group allows unrestricted ingress access to remote server administration ports, such as SSH to port 22 and RDP to port 3389.
